reviews.review: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive очень интересная и классная игра))))
super gra, duzo dowiedziałem sie o przeszłości mojej rodziny, pozdrawiam
Started to play about 20 years ago with CS 1.5.... since then, it had its ups and downs but right now, its one of the best FPS game with a great and huge community
HİLE DOLU  OYUN AMA YİNEDE BIRAKAMIYOM

CS is the quintessential FPS, skill based, plenty of strategy and tactics to learn. Defined a genre and still in 2021 shines with amazing gun play and a great competitive scene with a high skill ceiling.
DÜNYANIN EN İYİ OYUNU ÇÜNKÜ 300 LİRALIK KASA KAZANDIM VALORANT NEYMİŞ AQ CS GO BEST

Глобальная проблема с системой VAC.
Если ваша ЦНС(Центральная Нервная Система) в порядке,то можете пощекотать себе нервишки)
Full of salty people and MM sucks 90% of the time, yet somehow still find myself coming back to it :P

I dislike the premade accounts (smurfs), there's no protection against that. When playing in competitive matches, in my experience I've come across gold 3 elite in the enemy team, while being silver 2 myself, making the game kinda mission impossible.

I like the game in general. There are always going to be toxic players, no protection against that. I like the fact that there's no report or danger to be banned for inappropriate language. Sometimes a man gotta reply to what has come. Otherwise just mute the annoying one and enjoy the game.

Have fun with your friends. Highly recommend you to gather up and laugh/cry together.
so so, could have been worse
Great game if you get past all the cheaters since the game is free now.
